title.narrative: OPT 2.4. COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT FOR THE DESIGN AND DELIVERY OF QUALITY EDUCATION SE

description.narrative: Families, community representatives, children and adolescents engage in education management committees, and influence the design and delivery of quality education services in eight of the municipalities receiving UNICEF support.

sector.narrative: System strengthening - community participation and social accountability, e.g. school management committees
System strengthening - gender equitable skills development (excluding SRGBV)
System strengthening - life skills (for personal empowerment, active citizenship, etc.)

title.narrative: Bolivia United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Bolivia Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Education)
UNICEF Programmes in Bolivia (Every Child Learns)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2016 Bolivia: Evaluación de impacto de la estrategia de gestión educativa integral para el ámbito municipal
Bolivia 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Families, community representatives, children and adolescents engage in education management committees, and influence the design and delivery of quality education services in eight of the municipalities receiving UNICEF support.

description.narrative: The results focused on promoting social participation in education, especially the creation of Socio-Community Educational Councils and Student Governments and training for participants. The purpose of this work is to help students and the community influence educational quality improvement efforts and address issues like violence prevention, teenage pregnancy and HIV in the education system. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: % of student governments that include activities for transforming gender roles and for developing positive masculinity (de-patriarchalization)

target.value: 2022:50% in 6 municipalities: Cobija, Gonzalo Moreno, Chimore, Puerto Villaroel, Independencia, El Alto.

title.narrative: Service Delivery - Communities - School management committees (or parent teacher association or school communities or similar structure) whose capacity was developed through UNICEF-supported programmes - see guidance

target.value: 2022:80% in 6 municipalities: Cobija, Gonzalo Moreno, Chimore, Puerto Villaroel, Independencia, El Alto

title.narrative: % of socio-community educational councils in which boys and girls participate in the municipalities supported by UNICEF

target.value: 2022:80% in 6 municipalities: Cobija, Gonzalo Moreno, Chimore, Puerto Villaroel, Independencia, El Alto.

title.narrative: Gender equality in the make-up of secondary level student governments, with support from UNICEF

target.value: 2022:80% 6 municipalities: Cobija, Gonzalo Moreno, Chimore, Puerto Villaroel, Independencia, El Alto.
